00021 #ifndef __NEIGHBORLIST2_H
00022 #define __NEIGHBORLIST2_H
00023 
00024 #include <votca/tools/globals.h>
00025 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00026 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00027 
00028 namespace TOOLS = votca::tools;
00029 
00030 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00031 
00032 
00033 class Neighborlist : public QMCalculator
00034 {
00035 public:
00036 
00037     Neighborlist() { };
00038    ~Neighborlist() { };
00039 
00040     string Identify() { return "Neighborlist"; }
00041     
00042     void Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options);
00043     bool EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);
00044 
00045 private:
00046 
00047     map< string, map<string,double> > _cutoffs;
00048     bool                              _useConstantCutoff;
00049     double                            _constantCutoff;
00050 
00051 };
00052     
00053 
00054 void Neighborlist::Initialize(Topology* top, Property *options) {
00055 
00056     string key = "options.neighborlist";
00057 
00058     list< Property* > segs = options->Select(key+".segments");
00059     list< Property* > ::iterator segsIt;
00060 
00061     for (segsIt = segs.begin();
00062          segsIt != segs.end();
00063          segsIt++) {
00064 
00065         string types = (*segsIt)->get("type").as<string>();
00066         double cutoff = (*segsIt)->get("cutoff").as<double>();
00067 
00068         Tokenizer tok(types, " ");
00069         vector< string > names;
00070         tok.ToVector(names);
00071 
00072         if (names.size() != 2) {
00073             cout << "ERROR: Faulty pair definition for cut-off's: "
00074                  << "Need two segment names separated by a ' '" << endl;
00075             throw std::runtime_error("Error in options file.");
00076         }
00077 
00078         _cutoffs[names[0]][names[1]] = cutoff;
00079         _cutoffs[names[1]][names[0]] = cutoff;
00080 
00081     }
00082 
00083     if (options->exists(key+".constant")) {
00084         _useConstantCutoff = true;
00085         _constantCutoff = options->get(key+".constant").as< double >();
00086     }
00087     else {
00088         _useConstantCutoff = false;
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool Neighborlist::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00093 
00094     top->NBList().Cleanup();
00095 
00096     vector< Segment* > ::iterator segit1;
00097     vector< Segment* > ::iterator segit2;
00098     vector< Fragment* > ::iterator fragit1;
00099     vector< Fragment* > ::iterator fragit2;
00100 
00101     double cutoff;
00102     vec r1;
00103     vec r2;
00104 
00105     for (segit1 = top->Segments().begin();
00106             segit1 < top->Segments().end();
00107             segit1++) {
00108         
00109             Segment *seg1 = *segit1;
00110 
00111         for (segit2 = segit1 + 1;
00112                 segit2 < top->Segments().end();
00113                 segit2++) {
00114             
00115             Segment *seg2 = *segit2;
00116 
00117             if (!_useConstantCutoff) {
00118                 // Find cut-off
00119                 try {
00120                     cutoff = _cutoffs.at(seg1->getName()).at(seg2->getName());
00121                 }
00122                 catch (out_of_range) {
00123                     cout << "ERROR: No cut-off specified for segment pair "
00124                          << seg1->getName() << " | " << seg2->getName() << ". "
00125                          << endl;
00126                     throw std::runtime_error("Missing input in options file.");
00127                 }
00128             }
00129 
00130             else { cutoff = _constantCutoff; }
00131 
00132 
00133             bool stopLoop = false;
00134             for (fragit1 = seg1->Fragments().begin();
00135                     fragit1 < seg1->Fragments().end();
00136                     fragit1 ++) {
00137 
00138                 if (stopLoop) { break; }
00139 
00140                 for (fragit2 = seg2->Fragments().begin();
00141                         fragit2 < seg2->Fragments().end();
00142                         fragit2++) {
00143 
00144 
00145                     r1 = (*fragit1)->getPos();
00146                     r2 = (*fragit2)->getPos();
00147                     if( abs( top->PbShortestConnect(r1, r2) ) > cutoff ) {
00148                         continue;
00149                     }
00150                     else {
00151                         top->NBList().Add(seg1, seg2);
00152                         stopLoop = true;
00153                         break;
00154                     }                
00155 
00156                 } /* exit loop frag2 */
00157             } /* exit loop frag1 */
00158         } /* exit loop seg2 */
00159     } /* exit loop seg1 */
00160 
00161     cout << endl << "... ... Created " << top->NBList().size() << " pairs.";
00162 
00163     
00164     if (TOOLS::globals::verbose) {
00165         cout << "[idA:idB] com distance" << endl;
00166         QMNBList& nblist = top->NBList();
00167         for (QMNBList::iterator ipair = nblist.begin(); ipair != nblist.end(); ++ipair) {
00168                 QMPair *pair = *ipair;
00169                 Segment* segment1 = pair->Seg1PbCopy();
00170                 Segment* segment2 = pair->Seg2PbCopy();
00171                 cout << " [" << segment1->getId() << ":" << segment2->getId()<< "] " << pair->Dist()<< endl;
00172         }
00173     }
00174 
00175     
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 
00180 
00181 }}

00183 #endif  /* __NEIGHBORLIST2_H */
